title: "Computers that power self-driving cars could be a huge driver of global carbon emissions"
excerpt: "A new model quantifies emissions that will be generated by computers on fully autonomous vehicles. If self-driving cars are widely adopted, their emissions will rival those generated by all the data centers in the world today."
